LanguageData.Hediff_AEFatigue.label: 疲劳
LanguageData.Hediff_AEFatigue.description: 身体昏沉，需要额外的休息
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.label: 禁果效应
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.description: 果实对身体产生影响。\n它似乎让宿主的思想更加敏锐，令其更加睿智。
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.0.label: 寻索
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.1.label: 觉知
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.2.label: 启悟
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.3.label: 超脱
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.4.label: 惩罚
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruit.stages.5.label: 愤怒
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruitWithdrawal.label: 禁果影响抑制
LanguageData.Hediff_AEForbiddenFruitWithdrawal.descri: 减轻禁果对身体的影响。\n这似乎会减弱宿主对超凡压力的感受。
LanguageData.Hediff_AEDigestingPie.label: 正在消化派
